name: Joe Zobkiw
body:
### About
I'm a Mac and iOS software developer who has been writing code for Apple products since 1986. Please contact me if I can assist with your project.

You can learn more about my work at [Zobcode LLC](http://zobcode.com/).

### Recent Work
[Jordan Rudess Explores](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/jordan-rudess-explores/id642402161?mt=8) is an interactive iOS app based on the solo piano album [All That Is Now](https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/all-that-is-now/id759424806) by Jordan Rudess, keyboardist extraordinaire for the progressive-metal group Dream Theater.

[Timehop](http://timehop.com) is *a time capsule of you* for which I wrote both Mac and iOS code with their awesome NYC-based team.

I am a constant contributor to [Halsey Burgund's](http://halseyburgund.com) location-aware audio platform [Roundware](http://www.roundware.org/) and many of the apps that use it.

### Contact
email zobkiw@gmail.com

twitter @zobskewed
